summary:
Brief:
Here is just a simple, mostly "bugless" (none that i have seen) mod that I have made, which in its most simple state adds a throw-able tomato bomb. I know it sounds stupid but it is just a dummy so that the size of the object is symbolic of the ideal size of the final version. But to the point, this mod is simply here for publi
descriptionHtml:
The tomato bomb I have made is pretty basic and simply uses an arrow projectile, from a spell/scroll, to 'lob' it as if it is thrown. The bomb itself only does one thing and creates an 'Explosive gas trap' that is primarily there for making a trap against pyromancers and torch-wielders. But aside from this it does nothing special, although this effect is useful for testers to see if the bomb is working.

What I need you, the modding community, to do is to check the mod out and play test it. Check if the projectile: is too slow, has too much gravity, has too long of a timer, look/acts funny, is bugging out, needs improvement, etc. Also if any testers have any good ideas for other bombs to make then please comment them to me.
Lastly, don't expect much because the mod is in its crappy state and is only here so that i can improve the basics of it as best I can.

Testing Info:
Where to find it: in the console put in 'coc BBTESTCELL'
Where to respond: In the comments
